titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to J. H. Graham
CWG13804

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1865 Telegraphing, State Guards, Printing, Hospital, Office Expenses, Services Rendered; Right Stack

body.p:
No. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To J H Graham opr Dr

row.cell: For Services Rendered as Telegraph Oper for Oct 1865

body.p: I Certify that the above account is correct and just; that the services were rendered as stated; and that they were necessary for the public service.
Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 31st of October, 1865, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-Master General of the State of Kentucky, the sum of Thirty Dollars, and Cents, in full of the above account.

No. 22.
No. 53 Abstract B"2" Qr. 186.
J. H. Graham
Dollars 30 x/100
Paid 31st October, 1865.
Services rendered
